    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uses of gamma rays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebräuche von gamma Strahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations des rayons gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos de raios gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi dei raggi gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις των ακτίνων γάμμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones de rayos gammas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing the use of gamma rays. Here, it illustrates how gamma rays kill cancer cells inside the body.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cancer cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die den Gebrauch von 
gamma Strahlen zeigen. Hier veranschaulicht er, wie gamma 
Strahlen Krebszellen innerhalb des Körpers beenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des rayons gamma. Ici, elle illustre comment les 
rayons gamma détruisent des cellules de cancer à l'intérieur du 
corps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram o
uso de raios gamma. Aqui, ilustra como os raios gamma matam 
pilhas de cancer dentro do corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano 
l'uso dei raggi gamma. Qui, illustra come i raggi gamma uccidono
le cellule di cancro all'interno del corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση των 
ακτίνων γάμμα. Εδώ, επεξηγεί πώς οι ακτίνες γάμμα 
σκοτώνουν τα κύτταρα καρκίνου μέσα στο σώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran el uso
de rayos gammas. Aquí, ilustra cómo los rayos gammas matan a 
las células de cáncer dentro del cuerpo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krebszellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gamma Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gamma Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cellules de cancer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayons gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
